definition[0]: to treat someone or something as unimportant, for example by not meeting someone or not going to an event
example[0]: Bud got into trouble for blowing off the meeting.
definition[1]: to make known something that was secret, especially something involving important or famous people
example[1]: Her book blew the lid off the Reagan years.
definition[2]: to kill someone by shooting them in the head
definition[3]: to get rid of anger or energy by doing something
example[2]: I went jogging to blow off some steam.
